作为一个300小时的萌新，我只想说感谢在我修电机都不会的时候，看不下去我那么菜一次次把我抱到地窖放走的屠屠们。。。极其胆小的我感受到了屠屠们对新手的关爱，坚持玩了下去（但还是很对不起之前牺牲了的三个路人队友们我是菜鸡）。现在玩屠夫的时候，遇到萌新们也会放走一两个，看着他们修机开门。
杀鸡又限免了，萌新们不要觉得恐怖就不来尝试了呀，玩到后面就变成了一个竞技类游戏了，一点都不可怕了，反正大不了就是三挂上西天hhh

The gameplay is very cool and fun. There is plenty of choice for both killers and survivors. Unfortunately, after most of the updates there are a few bugs but fortunately these are always in a few days fixed.
I can only recommend the game to others.

So ein Mist. Fliege öfters raus wegen schlechtem Internet und Dead by daylight kann nicht mal nach über 5 Jahren unterscheiden, ob man das Spiel absichtlich verlassen hat oder rausgeflogen ist. Bin jetzt 6 Stunden gebannt, ohne dass ich was dafür kann. Über die ganzen Bugs und Fehler kann man hinwegsehen, aber nicht über sowas.

Fun game, both as killer and as survivor. Each match is different, with all the perks, items and random positions in maps. They also regularly bring new chapters, which contain new killer/survivors, perks and maps. The story backgrounds and recordings are also interesting to read & listen. Though some players are kinda bad loosers and/or are toxic, but it has no effect on your game experience. Only sad thing is that you can't be a killer, have a friend as survivor and do public match, you can only do private match (but its understandable since otherwise friends could tell position of other survivors).
If you wanna have fun play it for fun if you wanna tryhard play it for that.
This game supports NFTs, do not buy it

As a concept, the game is great. I love the cast of original characters on both Killer and Survivor sides, and that so many iconic characters can come together in one place.

However... the game is horribly unbalanced. At lower skill levels, this game is fine. At higher ranks/skill level though, it becomes an absolute nightmare of the same handful of perks, items, add-ons, etc. The same top-tier Killers, the same map offerings, the same... everything. Not to mention Survivors have so much going for them that they can either shift the tide of a match on a dime or even give the Killer zero chance to win at all. Granted, this is to be expected in a multiplayer game like this, but it just feels like the game is going out of its way to give Survivors every single chance they can get, whilst the Killer just stands there and takes it.

On another note, the devs don't care at all. The community has begged for something new. For balance changes to make the game more fair. And they only respond with more in-game currency. On top of all that, the devs have decided to align themselves with companies making NFTs. If you know what an NFT is, then you know why that's bad. If you don't, then it's a simple Google search away. As much as I love this game as a concept, and the characters present here, I cannot reccomend this game in good faith until Behavior Interactive addresses the issues present in the game, and cuts all ties with these NFTs.
Decently fun game, some killers are more complicated than others and a decent amount of toxicity exists within the community. No other game will get your heart racing like this one.
